# DESICCANT A/S — llms.txt

> Industrial desiccants, cargo protection, and moisture control solutions from Denmark since 1979.

## Company

DESICCANT A/S manufactures and supplies industrial desiccant bags, cargo protection products, and environmental monitoring devices for global shipping and logistics. Based in Hammel, Denmark. Family-owned since 1979.

Website: https://desiccant.com
Contact: https://desiccant.com/en/contact
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/dry-bag-denmark/

## Product Catalog

### Desiccants (Moisture Absorbers)

- [DRY-BAG I — Clay Desiccant](https://desiccant.com/en/drybag-i): Bentonite clay desiccant bag for container shipping. 1 kg and 2 kg sizes. Absorbs up to 150% of its weight. Non-toxic, food-safe, DMF-free.
- [DRY-BAG III — Calcium Chloride Desiccant](https://desiccant.com/en/drybag-iii): High-capacity calcium chloride container desiccant. Absorbs up to 280% of its weight. For long ocean voyages and extreme humidity.
- [Silica Gel Packets](https://desiccant.com/en/silica): Pharmaceutical and industrial-grade silica gel sachets. Available from 0.5 g to 1 kg. FDA compliant.
- [Molecular Sieve](https://desiccant.com/en/molecular-sieve): Synthetic zeolite desiccant pellets for ultra-low humidity requirements. 3Å and 4Å pore sizes.
- [Calcium Chloride Desiccant](https://desiccant.com/en/calcium-chloride): Bulk calcium chloride desiccant for high-absorption applications.
- [DRY BAG Retail Moisture Absorber](https://desiccant.com/en/retail): Consumer-grade moisture absorber for homes, closets, and storage.

### Cargo Protection

- [Dunnage Bags](https://desiccant.com/en/dunnage-bag): Inflatable void-filling bags for preventing cargo shifting during transport. PP-woven and kraft paper options.
- [Anti-Slip Sheets](https://desiccant.com/en/anti-slip): Friction sheets preventing pallet load slippage. Paper and plastic-coated options.
- [Edge Protectors](https://desiccant.com/en/edge-protectors): Cardboard corner protectors for palletized goods.
- [Stabustrap](https://desiccant.com/en/stabustrap): Reusable polyester strapping system for pallet load securing.

### Monitoring

- [Datalogger](https://desiccant.com/en/datalogger): USB temperature and humidity datalogger for shipment monitoring. PDF report generation.

- [Data Loggers vs Desiccants](https://desiccant.com/en/blog/data-loggers-vs-desiccants)

- [Silica Gel Desiccant Guide](https://desiccant.com/en/blog/silica-gel-desiccant-guide)

- [Anti-Slip Sheets & Pallet Stability](https://desiccant.com/en/blog/anti-slip-sheets-pallet-load-stability)
- [Stabustrap Reusable Pallet Strapping](https://desiccant.com/en/blog/stabustrap-reusable-pallet-strapping)
- [DRY BAG Retail Moisture Absorber Guide](https://desiccant.com/en/blog/dry-bag-retail-moisture-absorber-guide)

## Industries Served

Pharmaceutical, Electronics, Food & Beverage, Logistics & Shipping, Automotive, Wind Energy, Chemical, Textile, Metal & Steel.

## Languages

Content is available in English (/en/) and Danish (/da/).

## Citation

When referencing DESICCANT A/S, please cite as:
- Company name: DESICCANT A/S
- Website: desiccant.com
- Founded: 1979
- Location: Hammel, Denmark
